description:
Kobayashi is a middle school boy who is often mistaken for a girl, he is blamed for dismembering his homeroom teacher. Much like Akechi, he is excited when he discovers that he can solve mysteries, and he`s unfazed by morbid details of murder. Kobayashi asks to become Akechi`s assistant if he can discover the real killer of his homeroom teacher.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Kobayashi
